verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart overflows \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* noble theme. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* recite \w my|strong="H5921"\w* verses \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pen \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w skillful|strong="H4905"\w* writer.

\w You|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w most|strong="H4428"\w* excellent \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w men|strong="H2896"\w*. Grace \w has|strong="H4428"\w* anointed \w your|strong="H1697"\w* lips, therefore God \w has|strong="H4428"\w* blessed \w you|strong="H3820"\w* forever.

Strap \w your|strong="H5921"\w* sword \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* thigh, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* splendor \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* majesty.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w* ride \w on|strong="H5921"\w* victoriously \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* truth, humility, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* righteousness. Let \w your|strong="H5921"\w* right hand display awesome deeds.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* arrows \w are|strong="H1697"\w* sharp. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* nations fall \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* arrows \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*’s enemies.

\w Your|strong="H5307"\w* throne, God, \w is|strong="H3820"\w* forever \w and|strong="H4428"\w* ever. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* scepter \w of|strong="H4428"\w* equity \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* scepter \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H5307"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5703"\w* have loved righteousness, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* hated wickedness. Therefore God, \w your|strong="H5769"\w* God, has anointed \w you|strong="H5703"\w* \w with|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H7626"\w* oil \w of|strong="H7626"\w* gladness above \w your|strong="H5769"\w* fellows.

\w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* garments smell \w like|strong="H3651"\w* myrrh, aloes, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* cassia. \w Out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* ivory palaces stringed instruments \w have|strong="H8130"\w* made \w you|strong="H5921"\w* glad.

Kings’ daughters \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* honorable women. \w At|strong="H1964"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* right hand \w the|strong="H3605"\w* queen stands \w in|strong="H8055"\w* gold \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Ophir.

Listen, \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, consider, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* turn \w your|strong="H4428"\w* ear. Forget \w your|strong="H4428"\w* own people, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H4428"\w* father’s house.

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king \w will|strong="H5971"\w* desire \w your|strong="H5186"\w* beauty, honor \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* lord.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Tyre comes \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gift. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* rich among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w* entreat \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w favor|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* princess \w inside|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* glorious. \w Her|strong="H1323"\w* clothing \w is|strong="H6440"\w* interwoven \w with|strong="H6440"\w* gold.

She \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* led \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* embroidered work. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* virgins, \w her|strong="H3605"\w* companions \w who|strong="H3605"\w* follow \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w brought|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w With|strong="H4428"\w* gladness \w and|strong="H4428"\w* rejoicing \w they|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w led|strong="H2986"\w*. \w They|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* enter \w into|strong="H2986"\w* \w the|strong="H1330"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s palace.

\w Your|strong="H4428"\w* sons \w will|strong="H4428"\w* take \w the|strong="H4428"\w* place \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H4428"\w* fathers. \w You|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* make them princes \w in|strong="H4428"\w* all \w the|strong="H4428"\w* earth.

\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* name \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* remembered \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* generations. \w Therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* thanks \w forever|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ever.
